name: BYTE BASH
description:
FULL SCREEN IT

how to play: click on the hammer to see structures to build and click on the folder for units to place, with 2 points you can buy a micro chip to place your files on and units need to be spread apart  for computer storage stuff (hence the theme "data") place units to kill the malware trying to destroy your pc

build your micro chip city and defend it with cute file types like .txt, . exe and .jpeg

the malware dudes are attacking and you need to make them not do that

music: Chiptune Shopping Adventures - Eight Bit/8-bit - Royalty Free Music - YouTube.
art and code: ME, I DID IT AHAHAHAHHAH!!!!
